info.title: XC-Gate (Preview)
info.description: XC-Gate is a form digitization solution that helps improve operational efficiency in record keeping and management. XC-Gate can digitize paper forms such as daily reports and inspection sheets that exist in any business.

post.description: Login to XC-Gate to obtain credentials.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: Set the host name to which the connector is to be connected.
